Name: Animaddicts 4
About the game: In this game you have to climb objects in the scenario to try to climb as high as possible. This is a game for people who like to test their skills and patience as it is a game that requires a lot of calm and skill. This game is also for cartoon lovers as the visual art is from 80's cartoons. Features and Content Two Characters to choose and play One level with obstacles
